audioText: Cette rue piétonne du centre-ville attire de nombreux touristes grâce à ses boutiques traditionnelles et ses cafés authentiques.
question: Why does this pedestrian street attract many tourists?
options: Because of its traditional shops and authentic cafés
Because it has the best restaurants in the city
Because it hosts frequent cultural festivals
Because it offers the cheapest shopping prices
explanation: The text explains that the street 'attire de nombreux touristes grâce à ses boutiques traditionnelles et ses cafés authentiques' - attracts many tourists thanks to its traditional shops and authentic cafés. 'Rue' means street, and 'piétonne' means pedestrian-only.
